item.title: PROJECT EULER
item.description: Today I am happy to share a special treat with you: A Jupyter notebook full of solved tasks from Project Euler, programmed in Python. For those of you who don’t know Project Euler yet: It is a collection of challenging math/programming problems designed to develop logical thinking and programming skills. thinking and programming skills. You can launch the notebook directly from Binder or download it from GitHub to explore it in your own environment.
